thread.title: BRIEF-Toupargel Groupe Signs 40 Million Euros Worth Of Financing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Toupargel Groupe Signs 40 Million Euros Worth Of Financing

organizations.name: brief-toupargel groupe signs 40 million euros worth of financing feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - TOUPARGEL GROUPE SA:
* SIGNS 40 MILLION EUR WORTH OF FINANCING TO ACCOMPANY ITS STRATEGIC PLAN OXYGENE 2020‍​
* FINANCING INCLUDES SENIOR LOAN AGREEMENT OF € 15 MILLION,
* FINANCING INCLUDES A € 15 MILLION PROPERTY SALE AND LEASEBACK TRANSACTION INVOLVING 4 SITES
* FINANCING INCLUDES A € 10 MILLION CONTRIBUTION FROM MAJOR SHAREHOLDERS. Source text: bit.ly/2DTIPJp Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
